thread.title: Report Card: Grading the Bengals performance vs. the Chiefs
thread.title_full: Report Card: Grading the Bengals performance vs. the Chiefs

title: Report Card: Grading the Bengals performance vs. the Chiefs
text:
Posted: 8:51 p.m. Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015 Report Card: Grading the Bengals performance vs. the Chiefs By Jay Morrison Staff Writer 
Cincinnati Bengals head coach Marvin Lewis said Sunday’s 36-21 victory against the Kansas City Chiefs was “probably the best” game the team has played this season. 
And while the win took the Bengals to 4-0 and marked the first time in franchise history they have thrown for at least 300 yards and rushed for at least touchdowns in the same game, it was not quite worthy of a straight-A report card.
